# Software

* [learnr](https://rstudio.github.io/learnr/) - R package that allows development of interactive web-based R tutorials.
* [Feedback at scale](https://minecr.shinyapps.io/feedback-at-scale/) - tutorial for using `learnr` and `gradethis` as teaching tools.


# Books

* [rstudio4edu](https://rstudio4edu.github.io/rstudio4edu-book/) - A Handbook for Teaching and Learning with R and RStudio - still very much a draft.



# Online Resources

# Other

* [Bioicons](https://bioicons.com/) - a collection of free drawings and diagrams on biological topics, which can be used in teaching (or research) presentations.
